name: Palenque Ruins
description:
The largest archaeological site in Chiapas, hundreds of ruined buildings are spread over 15 sq km, but only a fairly compact central area has been excavated.

Approach

The site is located near the town of Palenque and is accesible by passenger car.

Descent

Most visitors take a combi or taxi to the ruinsâ€™ main (upper) entrance, see the major structures and then walk downhill to the museum, visiting minor ruins along the way

Exit
